ValidationRule.description: Parent must be nominated for a StarTrack account whose invoice is paid by another follower account under the same leader account hierarchy.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL(AccountType__c, 'Offspring Follower'), ISBLANK(ParentBillingAccount__c), ISBLANK(ParentAccountRequest__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please include the Parent account number related to the Offpsring Account.
